label: 紀斉名
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (957-999). Kanshi in several collections, Wakan rōeishū 和漢朗詠集(9), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (28), and Sakumon daitai (1). Compositions in Honchō monzui. Comp. Fusōshū (995-999). [漢詩、作文大体、本朝文粋、扶桑集]
